tasks.task: the main tasks would be Farming and Harvesting. Therefore, Farming and Harvesting would be the MAINTASKs, each with their subtasks.
Planting Peach Trees (perhaps not in the video)
Growing Peach Trees (selecting varieties, adjusting pH, planting, pruning, managing water, pollinating, thinning)
Harvesting Peaches (gently removing, placing in baskets, sorting)
Growing Peaches (includes selecting, preparing soil, planting, pruning, managing water, pollination, thinning)
Hand-Harvesting Peaches (includes removing, handling gently, placing in baskets, sorting)
Processing Peaches (could be involved if the person works at the packing facility, but since it's more post-harvest)
